gov.ornl.hadoop.utils.spatial

Class ChangeDetection

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configured
      • org.apache.mahout.common.AbstractJob
        • gov.ornl.hadoop.utils.spatial.ChangeDetection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configurable, org.apache.hadoop.util.Tool

    public class ChangeDetection
extends org.apache.mahout.common.AbstractJob
    Runs a time series change detection tool on spatial data. Usage:\ [--input \ --output \ --delim ]
    Options
    --input (-i) input Path to job input directory.
    --output (-o) output The directory pathname for output.
    --delim (-dl) delim Delimiter for columns. Default is , (\)
    Author:
    chandola

      • isSpatialValid

        public static boolean isSpatialValid(float x,
                     float y,
                     float ltX,
                     float ltY,
                     float rbX,
                     float rbY)
        Checks if a given point is inside the spatial bounding box.
        Parameters:
        x - - x coordinate of query point
        y - - y coordinate of query point
        ltX - - x coordinate of top left corner of the bounding box
        ltY - - y coordinate of top left corner of the bounding box
        rbX - - x coordinate of bottom right corner of the bounding box
        rbY - - y coordinate of bottom right corner of the bounding box
        Returns:
        true if point is within the box, false otherwise
